short_summary: Duration: 2 years, Options: 2 years. Services: Technical Architect, Programmer/Analyst.
description: Provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) on an as-and-when-requested basis to install, configure, support, maintain, and enhance the performance of DND’s Enterprise Web Content Management System (EWCMS).

full_summary:
### TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS)
#### (Request for Proposal)

**Notice ID:** PW-23-01020465
**Publication Date:** January 9, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
**End User Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Security Requirements:**
This request has security requirements associated with it. Refer to Part 6 of the Request for Proposal for additional information.

**Duration and Delivery:**
The contract duration will be from February 1, 2023, to January 31, 2025. The delivery timeframe will also span from February 1, 2023, to January 31, 2025.

**Pricing and Evaluation Criteria:**
Bidders are invited to submit a proposal for the provision of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) on an "as-and-when-requested basis" for the installation, configuration, support, maintenance, and enhancement of the Department of National Defence's Enterprise Web Content Management System (EWCMS). The evaluation criteria will be based on the bidder's responsiveness, relevance of their proposed solution, and the price proposed.

**Eligible Bidders:**
Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) holders in Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following technical categories: 
   * I.10 Technical Architect, Level 3
   * A.7 Programmer/Analyst, Level 2

**Notice:**
Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three times per year. Interested parties can contact the contracting authority, Alexander Stouffer (alexander.stouffer@forces.gc.ca), for more information.

**Security Requirements:**
 
**Requirements for Eligible Suppliers:** 
The sealed response shall include all required documentation as detailed in the Bidder Instructions. Respondents must submit, with their bid, a completely executed copy of the proposed supply arrangements, including all supporting documentation.

**Evaluation Criteria:** 
A thoroughly completed and signed proposal containing all requested information will be evaluated. Proposal evaluation weight: 40% must be for responsiveness, price considered 30% and remaining 30% must be for relevance.



This is just the official Notice of Intent to Provide Task Based Informatics Professional services. Interested parties should contact Alexander Stouffer, Contracting Authority, for more information.

Contact Information: 
 Alexander St
